exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

exceptions.tactic: apply (@coeff_Tn_ext (u2 i) (u1 i) (mk_Tn n u2) (mk_Tn n u1)).
exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type n : nat u1, u2 : nat -> T H : mk_Tn n u1 = mk_Tn n u2 i : nat Hn : (i < n)%nat The term "u2 i" has type "T" while it is expected to have type "Type".
In environment T : Type n : nat u1, u2 : nat -> T H : mk_Tn n u1 = mk_Tn n u2 i : nat Hn : (i < n)%nat Unable to unify "mk_Tn ?n (coeff_Tn ?M2439 ?M2440) = ?M2440" with "u1 i = u2 i".
In environment T : Type n : nat u1, u2 : nat -> T H : mk_Tn n u1 = mk_Tn n u2 i : nat Hn : (i < n)%nat Unable to unify "(i < n)%nat" with "u1 i = u2 i".

original: split. - intros H i Hn. apply (@coeff_Tn_ext (u1 i) (u2 i) (mk_Tn n u1) (mk_Tn n u2)). + apply mk_Tn_bij. + apply Hn. - intros H i Hn. apply (@coeff_Tn_ext (u2 i) (u1 i) (mk_Tn n u2) (mk_Tn n u1)). + apply mk_Tn_bij. + apply Hn.
